Detailed Description

Controller class for HTTP errors.

ErrorController is responsible for handling HTTP errors. This is an improved version of the mainstream ErrorController class.

Definition at line 11 of file error_controller.php.

Member Function Documentation

ErrorController::init (  )  [protected]

Custom initialization for the controller object.

Subclassers should override this method to perform specialized initialization. The default implementation does nothing.

Reimplemented from BaseController.
